password.description: Ensure your account is using a long, random password to stay secure

two_factor.title: Two-Factor Authentication
two_factor.enabled_description: With two-factor authentication enabled, you will be prompted for a secure, random pin during login, which you can retrieve from the TOTP-supported application on your phone.
two_factor.disabled_description: When you enable two-factor authentication, you will be prompted for a secure pin during login. This pin can be retrieved from a TOTP-supported application on your phone.
two_factor.enable_description: To finish enabling two-factor authentication, scan the QR code or enter the setup key in your authenticator app
two_factor.enabled_description: Two-factor authentication is now enabled. Scan the QR code or enter the setup key in your authenticator app.
two_factor.verify_code_description: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app
two_factor.recovery_codes_description: Recovery codes let you regain access if you lose your 2FA device. Store them in a secure password manager.
two_factor.recovery_codes_warning: Each recovery code can be used once to access your account and will be removed after use. If you need more, click Regenerate Codes above.

features.title: Features
features.description: Enable or disable features based on your business needs
features.alert: Disabling a feature will hide it from the sidebar and disable its routes. Changes take effect after page refresh.
features.core_description: Essential features for your POS system
features.advanced_description: Advanced features for complex business needs
features.loyalty_desc: Customer loyalty program with points and tiers
features.quotations_desc: Create and send quotations to customers
features.roles_desc: Role and permission management (disable if single user)
features.stock_transfers_desc: Stock transfer between locations (disable if single location)
features.activity_logs_desc: Detailed activity logging (disable if not needed)
features.accounting_desc: Double-entry accounting with Chart of Accounts, Journal Entries, Financial Reports

backup.database_backup_desc: Create a full database backup or restore from a previous backup
backup.export_data_desc: Export specific data types to JSON format
backup.create_confirm: Are you sure you want to create a backup? This may take a few moments.

auth.authentication_code_description: Enter the authentication code provided by your authenticator application.

welcome.title: Welcome to POS System
welcome.hero_description: Streamline your business operations with our comprehensive POS system. Manage inventory, process sales, track customers, and generate insightful reports all in one place.
welcome.feature_pos_desc: Fast and intuitive checkout system with barcode scanning and multiple payment methods.
welcome.feature_inventory_desc: Track stock levels, manage products, and get low stock alerts automatically.
welcome.feature_customers_desc: Manage customer information, track purchase history, and loyalty points.
welcome.feature_reports_desc: Generate detailed sales reports, track performance, and make data-driven decisions.
welcome.feature_payments_desc: Accept multiple payment methods including cash, card, and mobile payments.
welcome.feature_orders_desc: Process orders, handle refunds, and manage order history efficiently.
welcome.cta_description: Start managing your business more efficiently today. Sign up for free or log in to your existing account.

delete_user.title: Delete account
delete_user.description: Delete your account and all of its resources
delete_user.warning_message: Please proceed with caution, this cannot be undone.
delete_user.confirm_title: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
delete_user.confirm_description: Once your account is deleted, all of its resources and data will also be permanently deleted. Please enter your password to confirm you would like to permanently delete your account.
